item.title: About.
item.dc:creator: Craager
item.content:encoded: [kc_row use_container="yes" _id="395436"][kc_column width="12/12" _id="920131"][nk_tabs _id="738234" tabs_offset="true"][nk_tab title="History" _id="70759" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`padding|`:`49px inherit inherit inherit`}}}}"][nk_title tag="h2" like="h2" _id="819280" main_color="true" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`margin|`:`inherit inherit 20px inherit`}}}}"] Umbrella. is an international fashion brand that represents style and quality since 1968. Founded in New York. [/nk_title][kc_column_text _id="681221"] More customers are embracing basics anddrifting back to classic styles from one of the most famous jean retailers in the world. The world of fashion retail is ever changing, but we thrive on the challenge of constantly growing and adapting to succeed in this exciting industry. These progressive values are more than just ideals - we live them every day, in our dealings with our customers and our team. Although many entrepreneurs who establish fashion companies are professional designers, this is not a pre-requisite. Regardless of professional background, there are a few things to know when starting a fashion company. [/kc_column_text][/nk_tab][nk_tab title="Achievemnts" _id="184889" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`padding|`:`49px inherit inherit inherit`}}}}"][kc_row_inner column_align="middle" _id="365257"][kc_column_inner width="50%" _id="763969"][nk_title tag="h3" like="display-2" _id="928424"] 70 [/nk_title][kc_column_text _id="640199"] Completed Projects. We strive to always enrich our customers lives through high quality fashion and services. [/kc_column_text][/kc_column_inner][kc_column_inner width="50%" _id="228740"][nk_title tag="h3" like="display-2" _id="708025"] 25 [/nk_title][kc_column_text _id="867075"] Awards Won. We achieve this by creating an outstanding retail environment, offering unique brands and a superior customer journey. [/kc_column_text][/kc_column_inner][/kc_row_inner][kc_row_inner column_align="middle" _id="633007"][kc_column_inner width="50%" _id="585882"][nk_title tag="h3" like="display-2" _id="655111"] 160 [/nk_title][kc_column_text _id="514727"] Today, our network encompasses over 160 stores, with operations in eight markets across the Center. [/kc_column_text][/kc_column_inner][kc_column_inner width="50%" _id="259723"][nk_title tag="h3" like="display-2" _id="457539"] 60 [/nk_title][kc_column_text _id="369092"] Umbrella is a regional fashion retail leader, with a world-class portfolio of over 60 high-end fashion, footwear and accessories brands. [/kc_column_text][/kc_column_inner][/kc_row_inner][/nk_tab][nk_tab title="Why Choose Us" _id="755790" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`padding|`:`49px inherit inherit inherit`}}}}"][kc_column_text _id="780345"] Service: Every customer deserves a great shopping experience, every time. Our teams commitment to delivering the highest levels of service is what makes us distinctive. Integrity and Trust: We are honorable and ethical in everything we do. Our reputation is built on respect for others, exemplary behavior and the trust our stakeholders place in us. Passion for Winning: We love what we do, and want to be the best at it. We strive for success by always aiming higher not just meeting our objectives, but exceeding expectations as well. [/kc_column_text][/nk_tab][nk_tab title="Goals" _id="357316" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`padding|`:`49px inherit inherit inherit`}}}}"][kc_column_text _id="995057"] Our goal is to be the employer, partner and retail destination of choice in the Asia & Middle East. We will achieve this by building a creative and inclusive community with a culture of knowledge and innovation. We will enrich our customers lives through high quality fashion and services. We strive to achieve this by creating an outstanding retail environment, offering unique brands and a superior customer journey [/kc_column_text][/nk_tab][/nk_tabs][/kc_column][/kc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The Supermodels Always Bring Their Flawless Festival Style to Rio

item.title: Documentation.
item.dc:creator: Craager
item.content:encoded:
[kc_row _id="253528"][kc_column width="12/12" _id="10522"][nk_tabs _id="11774" tabs_offset="true"][nk_tab title="Getting Started" _id="245401" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`padding|`:`49px inherit inherit inherit`}}}}"][kc_row_inner column_align="middle" _id="691394"][kc_column_inner width="12/12" _id="650828"][nk_title tag="h2" like="h3" _id="151716" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`margin|`:`inherit inherit 33px inherit`}}}}"] Getting Started [/nk_title][kc_column_text _id="121821"] This is WordPress theme and first you need install WordPresshttps://codex.wordpress.org/Installing_WordPress Then, download theme form ThemeForest. [/kc_column_text][nk_title tag="h3" like="h4" _id="208700"] Install Theme [/nk_title][kc_single_image image_size="nk_1280x720" _id="307756" image_source="media_library" image="226" on_click_action="lightbox"][kc_column_text _id="184553"]
  1. Log into your WordPress blog admin dashboard;
  2. Go toAppearance>Themes;
  3. ClickAdd new;
  4. Click Upload Theme;
  5. Click Browse to browse for the theme installation file in donwnloaded package umbrella.zip. And click Install Now;
  6. After successful installation, click Activate to make the Umbrellaactive;
[/kc_column_text][nk_title tag="h3" like="h4" _id="227014"] InstallPlugins [/nk_title][kc_single_image image_size="nk_1280x720" _id="159586" image_source="media_library" image="225" on_click_action="lightbox"][kc_column_text _id="84783"]
  1. Go toAppearance>Install Plugins;
  2. Select all available plugins;
  3. SelectInstall and click Apply;
[/kc_column_text][nk_title tag="h3" like="h4" _id="789114"] Import Demo Data [/nk_title][kc_single_image image_size="nk_1280x720" _id="198086" image_source="media_library" image="224" on_click_action="lightbox"][kc_column_text _id="255461"] Before importing demo data make sure you have installed all plugins.
  1. Go toUmbrella>Demo Import;
  2. Click Import in main demo block;
[/kc_column_text][/kc_column_inner][/kc_row_inner][/nk_tab][nk_tab title="Navigations" _id="499718" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`padding|`:`49px inherit inherit inherit`}}}}"][kc_row_inner column_align="middle" _id="453982"][kc_column_inner width="12/12" _id="467028"][nk_title tag="h2" like="h3" _id="512000" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`margin|`:`inherit inherit 33px inherit`}}}}"] Navigations [/nk_title][kc_column_text _id="403043"] Umbrella have 5 menu locations. On image below you can see 4of them. 5 menu location - is bottom left menu for blog page. [/kc_column_text][kc_single_image image_size="nk_1280x720" _id="520180" image_source="media_library" image="222" on_click_action="lightbox"][kc_column_text _id="628868"] To setup menus, go to Appearance > Menus. There you can create your menus and place it in available locations. [/kc_column_text][kc_single_image image_size="nk_1280x720" _id="320285" image_source="media_library" image="223" on_click_action="lightbox"][/kc_column_inner][/kc_row_inner][/nk_tab][nk_tab title="Slider" _id="218046" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`padding|`:`49px inherit inherit inherit`}}}}"][kc_row_inner column_align="middle" _id="23658"][kc_column_inner width="12/12" _id="296667"][nk_title tag="h2" like="h3" _id="260982" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`margin|`:`inherit inherit 33px inherit`}}}}"] Slider [/nk_title][kc_column_text _id="898425"] The main feature of theme - is slider. You can manage each slide in Portfolio page in admin area. [/kc_column_text][kc_single_image image_size="nk_1280x720" _id="441691" image_source="media_library" image="221" on_click_action="lightbox"][kc_column_text _id="251845"] Youcan change background position per each slide and add categories. [/kc_column_text][kc_single_image image_size="nk_1280x720" _id="92716" image_source="media_library" image="220" on_click_action="lightbox"][kc_column_text _id="244074"] To change slider settings go to Customizer area. You can change transition effect, transition speed, autoplay and more... [/kc_column_text][/kc_column_inner][/kc_row_inner][/nk_tab][nk_tab title="Customizer" _id="334507" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`padding|`:`49px inherit inherit inherit`}}}}"][kc_row_inner column_align="middle" _id="670069"][kc_column_inner width="12/12" _id="644473"][nk_title tag="h2" like="h3" _id="302619" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`margin|`:`inherit inherit 33px inherit`}}}}"] Customizer [/nk_title][kc_column_text _id="207560"] Umbrella have about 100 global options. You can open it in admin panel Umbrella > Customize or Appearance > Customize. Below you can see screenshots with some customizer sections. There is no need to describe them all in documentation,because all of them have labels and descriptions. [/kc_column_text][kc_image_gallery columns="2" image_size="nk_500x500" _id="433576" images="244,243,242,241,240,239,238,237,236,235" type="grid" click_action="lightbox"][/kc_column_inner][/kc_row_inner][/nk_tab][nk_tab title="Page / Posts Options" _id="32337" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`padding|`:`49px inherit inherit inherit`}}}}"][kc_row_inner column_align="middle" _id="87099"][kc_column_inner width="12/12" _id="114369"][nk_title tag="h2" like="h3" _id="13648" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`margin|`:`inherit inherit 33px inherit`}}}}"] Metaboxes for Pages / Posts [/nk_title][kc_column_text _id="532181"] If you wantsome page looks different, then others - use custom page options. Below you can see screenshots with some metaboxes. There is no need to describe them all in documentation,because all of them have labels and descriptions. [/kc_column_text][kc_image_gallery columns="2" image_size="nk_500x500" _id="608032" images="249,248,247,246" type="grid" click_action="lightbox"][/kc_column_inner][/kc_row_inner][/nk_tab][nk_tab title="Contact Forms" _id="295088" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`padding|`:`49px inherit inherit inherit`}}}}"][kc_row_inner column_align="middle" _id="533428"][kc_column_inner width="12/12" _id="892262"][nk_title tag="h2" like="h3" _id="132558" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`margin|`:`inherit inherit 33px inherit`}}}}"] Contact Forms [/nk_title][kc_column_text _id="955860"] Umbrella compatible with Contact Form 7 plugin. You can use forms like on this page:Contact Us. [/kc_column_text][kc_single_image image_size="nk_1280x720" _id="610898" image_source="media_library" image="264"][/kc_column_inner][/kc_row_inner][/nk_tab][nk_tab title="Contact Forms" _id="832352" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`padding|`:`49px inherit inherit inherit`}}}}"][kc_row_inner column_align="middle" _id="804890"][kc_column_inner width="12/12" _id="997288"][nk_title tag="h2" like="h3" _id="744874" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`margin|`:`inherit inherit 33px inherit`}}}}"] Credits [/nk_title][kc_column_text _id="518932"] JavaScript Plugins:
  • jQuery - https://github.com/jquery/jquery
  • Bootstrap - https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap/tree/v4-dev
  • GSAP - https://github.com/greensock/GreenSock-JS
  • jQuery Validation - https://github.com/jzaefferer/jquery-validation
  • jQuery Form - https://github.com/malsup/form
  • Hammer.js - https://github.com/hammerjs/hammer.js
  • nanoScrollerJS -https://github.com/jamesflorentino/nanoScrollerJS
WordPress Plugins:
  • Kirki -https://aristath.github.io/kirki/
  • King Composer -https://kingcomposer.com/
  • ACF Pro -https://www.advancedcustomfields.com/pro/
  • Contact Form 7 -http://contactform7.com/
[/kc_column_text][/kc_column_inner][/kc_row_inner][/nk_tab][/nk_tabs][/kc_column][/kc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The Supermodels Always Bring Their Flawless Festival Style to Rio

item.title: Or a little pantaloon, while maybe not sexy, can be really pretty and sweet
item.dc:creator: Craager
item.content:encoded:
[kc_row use_container="yes" column_align="middle" video_bg_url="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dOWFVKb2JqM" _id="151020"][kc_column width="12/12" _id="283084"][kc_column_text _id="77598"]When starting a fashion company, an entrepreneur must identify his target customer. He must learn their gender and age. He must determine where and how often these individuals shop. He must also gain an understanding of what trends are currently popular with the demographic.[/kc_column_text][nk_block_quotes _id="90995" author="Sandra Lambert"] This knowledge will allow him to make business decisions based upon the tastes and buying patterns of those to whom he will be marketing his product. Likewise, affluent middle-aged aged men. [/nk_block_quotes][nk_title tag="h4" like="h4" _id="818998"] Marketing And Sales Plan [/nk_title][kc_column_text _id="581753"] While a fashion company with substantial financial resources may initiate a large-scale advertisement campaign, a smaller business may employee a grassroots approach consisting of postcard distribution and word of mouth. In addition to marketing, an entrepreneur must identify outlets for his products to be purchased. The greatest public relations campaign is for naught if customers cannot buy the products. [/kc_column_text][nk_title tag="h4" like="h4" _id="777561"] Startup Costs [/nk_title][/kc_column][/kc_row][kc_row use_container="yes" _id="345911"][kc_column width="50%" _id="505598"][kc_single_image image_size="nk_500x500" _id="886306" image_source="media_library" image="30"][/kc_column][kc_column width="50%" _id="695685"][kc_column_text _id="22465"] An entrepreneur must have a solid marketing and sales plan when starting a fashion company. This plan must align with the demographics of the organizations customer base, as well as fit into its annual budget. She must calculate the cost of overhead, such as offices, employee salaries, supplies and other materials. [/kc_column_text][/kc_column][/kc_row][kc_row use_container="yes" _id="245022"][kc_column width="12/12" _id="61043"][kc_column_text _id="98134"]
  • She must also consider incidental costs, such as postage;
  • Once a budget has been created, the entrepreneur must know;
  • She may apply for a bank loan;
  • She may also seek out investors or angels;
  • Alternatively, she may apply for grant money for which she may be eligible;
When starting a fashion company, an entrepreneur must identify his target customer. He must learn their gender and age. He must determine where and how often these individuals shop. He must also gain an understanding of what trends are currently popular with the demographic. [/kc_column_text][/kc_column][/kc_row]

item.title: Contact form 1
item.dc:creator: Craager
item.content:encoded:
<label> Your Name (required) [text* your-name] </label>
<label> Your Email (required) [email* your-email] </label>
<label> Subject [text your-subject] </label>
<label> Your Message [textarea your-message] </label>
[submit "Send"] Umbrella. "[your-subject]" [your-name] <wordpress@wp.nkdev.info> From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject]
Message Body: [your-message]
-- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Umbrella. (https://wp.nkdev.info/umbrella) nkdevinfo@gmail.com Reply-To: [your-email]
0 0
